pullrequest.title: Change train_windows (in minibatch) to sort in reverse, such that the last index will not be greater than 9999

content.raw: "but doesn't both of those names (especially MAX_GMTK_WINDOW_COUNT) imply our total list of windows should not be greater than 9999" is completely true. We don't do it in our case specifically (or even check for it), but we do work around a bug where GMTK errenously doesn't properly detect it. `MAX_GMTK_WINDOW_COUNT` would be entirely correct.
content.html: "but doesn't both of those names (especially MAX_GMTK_WINDOW_COUNT) imply our total list of windows should not be greater than 9999" is completely true. We don't do it in our case specifically (or even check for it), but we do work around a bug where GMTK errenously doesn't properly detect it. MAX_GMTK_WINDOW_COUNT would be entirely correct.
